headline: Cencora's animal health unit to merge with Covetrus in $3.5 billion deal
summary: Feb 18 (Reuters) - Drug distributor Cencora will merge its MWI Animal Health with privately held Covetrus in a deal valuing the unit at $3.5 billion, the companies said on Wednesday, creating a

content.title: Cencora's animal health unit to merge with Covetrus in $3.5 billion deal
content.summary: Feb 18 (Reuters) - Drug distributor Cencora will merge its MWI Animal Health with privately held Covetrus in a deal valuing the unit at $3.5 billion, the companies said on Wednesday, creating a

headline: Covetrus and MWI Animal Health to Merge
summary: CONSHOHOCKEN, Pa. & PORTLAND, Maine, February 18, 2026--Cencora (NYSE: COR) and Covetrus, a global animal health technology and services company, today announced that they have entered into a definitive agreement under which Covetrus and MWI Animal Health (MWI) will merge, creating a combined company offering a comprehensive animal health platform.

content.title: Covetrus and MWI Animal Health to Merge
content.summary: CONSHOHOCKEN, Pa. & PORTLAND, Maine, February 18, 2026--Cencora (NYSE: COR) and Covetrus, a global animal health technology and services company, today announced that they have entered into a definitive agreement under which Covetrus and MWI Animal Health (MWI) will merge, creating a combined company offering a comprehensive animal health platform.
